definition: society in which the material needs of most citizens are adequately met
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: It remains a historical mission for China to accelerate the process of urbanization, which will enable the nation to move towards moderate prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 大力推進城市化，是中國奔向小康社會的歷史重任。

sentences.english: The most difficult and onerous tasks to build a well-off society comprehensively focus on rural area.
sentences.chinese: 全面建設小康社會，最艱鉅最繁重的任務在農村。

sentences.english: The first 20 years of the 21st century represents an important strategic period for China to achieve all-round construction of a better-off society and to speed up its socialist modernization.
sentences.chinese: 21世紀頭20年，是中國全面建設小康社會。

sentences.english: The construction of political civilization is one of the most important standards for building comfortably-off society in an all-round way.
sentences.chinese: 政治文明建設是全面建設小康社會的一個重要標準。

sentences.english: During the 16th Party Congess, the CPC put forward the goal of completely building a Well-off society.
sentences.chinese: 黨的十六大提出了全面建設小康社會的目標。

sentences.english: The current 12th Five-year Plan period is a critical stage in China's efforts to build a society of initial prosperity in all respects.
sentences.chinese: “十二五”是中國全面建設小康社會的關鍵時期。

sentences.english: The realization of overall comfortably-off society is closely related to the coordinated development of health services.
sentences.chinese: 小康社會的全面達成離不開衛生事業的協調發展。

sentences.english: To completely build a "Xiaokang Society " in China, an appropriate universal-type social welfare system is a fundamental requirement.
sentences.chinese: 適度普惠型社會福利制度是全面建設小康社會的要求。

sentences.english: "Eliminating poverty in rural areas is the most difficult challenge to building a moderately prosperous society, " said Xi.
sentences.chinese: 農村貧困人口脫貧是全面建成小康社會最艱鉅的任務。

sentences.english: The realization of the well-off society requires people have high IQ.
sentences.chinese: 小康社會的實現需要人的高智商化。

sentences.english: To build a Xiaokang society in all respects is China's development goal by 2020.
sentences.chinese: 全面建成小康社會，是中國到2020年的發展目標。

sentences.english: Therefore, it establishes good leading foundation to build the society of comfortable standard of living all-sidedly.
sentences.chinese: 唯此，才能爲全面建設小康社會奠定良好的領導基礎。

sentences.english: China has taken another solid step towards the goal of building a well-off society in an all-round way.
sentences.chinese: 中國又向全面建設小康社會的目標邁出了堅實一步。

sentences.english: In the new century, we have come to the new strategy stage of building the whole well-off society.
sentences.chinese: 新的世紀，我國進入了建設全面小康社會的戰略階段。

sentences.english: The Chinese people are now going all out to build a well-off society in all aspects.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民正在全面建設小康社會的征程上奮勇前進。

sentences.english: In 2020, our country will be fully realize the grand goal of well-off society.
sentences.chinese: 2020年，我國將全面實現小康社會的宏偉目標。
